description: This file sets up a knowledge base with DOCX files, creates an agent with this knowledge, and runs asynchronous methods to load the knowledge base and print a response about the documents in the knowledge base.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base built from DOCX files.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database interface used for document search.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for search types, e.g., hybrid search.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints a response from the agent based on a query.
